LongDescription:
Have you ever wanted to change your screen saver on your Apple TV? 
 Find it annoying that you don't have the option to do videos? 
 Not anymore! change them with ease! With AerialChanger! 
 Simply AirDrop your video to Ethereal and let the tweak to do the rest! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1-1 Update for tvOS 14
